biotools.summary: An R package which functions provide an automated pipeline to perform expression analysis for Applied Biosystems Genome Survey Microarray (AB1700) data format. Functions include data preprocessing, filtering, control probe analysis, statistical analysis. A GUI interface is also provided.

bioschemas.name: ABarray
